title: Enchantments
data:
{{Obsolete}}

:''For the class of spells and effects known as "hostile enchantments", see [[Magic resistance#Resistible enchantments]].''

The '''Enchantments''' skill measures your ability with spells that enhance your own power (such as [[Haste]]) or debilitate monsters (such as [[Confuse]]).  Being skilled in Enchantments also increases your [[magic resistance]].
